findings.title: Minting of unsold tokens to `tokensWallet` on finalization can significantly alter the documented token allocations
findings.description: Basing the percentage allocations on the amount of tokens being offered for sale rather than the amount of tokens sold is problematic, potentially making the vesting period for team tokens appear insignificant and allowing market cap manipulation.

findings.title: Tokens are minted to the wrong wallet
findings.description: In the claimTeamTokens function, tokens are being sent to 'wallet' instead of 'tokenWallet', as intended.
